thought: To craft a polished_diorite, I need to craft 4 diorite. To craft diorite I need cobblestone and quartz. I have cobblestone, but I need to smelt the nether_quartz_ore in slot 41 into an empty slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: smelt from slot 41 to slot 11 with quantity 1
